uk.ac.liv.auction.agent
Class RandomValuer

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.AbstractRandomValuer
      uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.RandomValuer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, ValuationPolicy, AuctionEventListener, Parameterizable, Resetable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DailyRandomValuer, RandomScheduleValuer
public class RandomValuer
extends AbstractRandomValuer
implements java.io.Serializable

A valuation policy in which we randomly determine our valuation across all auctions and all units at agent-initialisation time. Valuations are drawn from a uniform distribution with the specified range.

Parameters

base .minvalue
double >= 0 		(the minimum valuation)
base .maxvalue
double >=0 		(the maximum valuation)

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
